info.title: Fairfield Programming Association
info.description: The Fairfield Programming Association is a league of schools in the south-eastern Connecticut area that focuses on teaching students important lessons in programming.

get.description: Use this endpoint to get the user data specified with the 'id' parameter.

200.description: The user data was found and sent to the client.

400.description: The client did not provide data for the 'id' parameter, or they provided the data incorrectly.

404.description: Could not find the user data associated with the 'id' parameter.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The numberic identifier of the user data.

delete.description: Use this endpoint to delete the user data specified with the 'id' parameter.

400.description: The client did not provide data for the 'id' parameter, or they provided the data incorrectly.
